ProxyFactory._logic (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.6.2/0f4c00139602ab502bc7c1c0e71d6cb72a9fb0e7_InitializableUpgradeabilityProxy.sol/0f4c00139602ab502bc7c1c0e71d6cb72a9fb0e7_InitializableUpgradeabilityProxy.sol#2521) gets value from a cross-contract call: HasLogic(factory).getLogic()
DHedgeFactory appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
The address of DHedgeFactory is loaded from storage slot IMPLEMENTATION_SLOT = 0x360894a13ba1a3210667c828492db98dca3e2076cc3735a920a3ca505d382bbc
Missing compatibility check in ProxyFactory.__ProxyFactory_init(address)
Missing compatibility check in ProxyFactory.setLogic(address)
To remove upgradeability, delete setLogic from ProxyFactory
